reviews.review: Best strategic game out there right now.

só joga q ta uma delicia

Lets begin with the concept. Hunt and hide experience online is brilliant, there is so much potential for other pop culture villains and heroes. The way the whole experience is broken down to every action has a consequence is genius. Creating, or developing an almost profile for the villains and survivors is my favourite part. I really enjoy trying different perks and add-ons and seeing what scenarios come up. The possibilities are endless. 
 For things that I dislike there are none. More suggestions perhaps the maps could be a little larger. drawing out a little longer game so as to take full advantage of the perks. When the trail is too short 4 out of the 5 players do not get the fulfilment of the perks they have chosen. And perhaps a way for the survivors to work together to kill the villains. A group kill end game based on perks and task completed.
  Anyways I could go on forever. Love the game, keep up the great work.


P.S. Maybe think about adding "The Creeper" from Jeepers Creeprs series. I love those movies and that villain.

Game is killer ping sided, you end up exhausted on the ground 90% of the time, the game is riddled with vpn killers from china that they do nothing about, console killers are just as bad. Hit boxs and getting randomly stuck on shit kill your chase's. Killers mostly run ruin, undying, and pop (perks to slow down the game) tunnel and camping killers that say gg ez at the end of the match when all they do is hook trade with 0 skill. The game is straight dog shit. 10/10 would cry about it more

The game is great. I enjoy it from running for my life as a survivor to hunting down victims as the killer. I do enjoy this game... when I can actually play it. Whenever I am actually in the mood to play DBD, the game is updating. Now, I'm not saying that the game spams updates (the updates are usually small and aren't common enough to be considered spamming), but that the updates take way too long. This is the only game within my library that spends over 20 minutes patching and verifying, and its a pain in the @ss. Even right now, I'm waiting for a 400 MB update to finish patching and verifying... and it's been almost 40 minutes. I would have said it was my pc, but even my friends with newer pcs and better wifi still go through the same sh!t. I get that it may be for the better of the game and it may work best, but considering that my mood to play is over before the update even finishes, I'm gonna have to say no for now. (if anyone has any tips for this problem or advice, feel free to comment. I would genuinely love to have a reason to change this review to a positive one and to instead focus on the gameplay rather than this issue)

I love playing this game. The only thing I honestly hate is bad killers. Not even killers that are bad at killers, it is killers who are just bad people. Some killers camp the hooks or the exists. Since they couldn't get a kill during the game, apparently the end is where they feel the need to take all of their anger out. Also survivors who are poor sports as well. Some people have installed cheats so that they can open exit gates faster or fly across the map to evade the killer during the exit rush. Still an awesome game though. Every batch has a few bad apples.
I love the thrill when the hairs on the back of my neck stand up when my heartbeat makes my ears bleed from each overpowered killer getting closer to me.
Simple game but the different characters and perks make every game feel different. Really fun to play with friends! highly recommend!
how can you make this game knowing how fucking shit it is, you want to win just back out.eat ass

¿En qué estaban pensando los desarrolladores en reiniciar todos los meses los rangos?XD es como matar el nulo sistema competitivo que generaste a lo largo de tu historia como juego, la gente necesita algun beneficio para gastar horas, es decir, nadie juega sin esperar algun tipo de recompensa más allá de las moneditas gratis del juego... Este nuevo sistema de rankeds es una muerte a largo plazo para el jueguito

As of the most recent update from Sept 7th, 2021 Dead by Daylight now awards players Bloodpoints once a month based on rank. The game now has a menstrual cycle. Instant great game.

Literal...Si jugas con supervivente...siempre te encontraras gente con peerks que son...Bueno soldaditos que dejas en el inodoro...Noed,Barbacoa y chile,ruinas y obviamente lo que no te tendria que faltar...¿Sabes? Ni yo lo se asi que pim pam pum trucu trucu.


En si el juego esta algo desbalanceado ya que el asesino tiene muchisimas ventajas con esas peerks y mas aun si usa un personaje como El hombre cum digo invisible o La enfermera :) Sin contar los otros.

¿Lo recomiendo? Si y no...Le vas a pegar un golpe al escritorio eso seguro vos tranqui porque yo le pegue al mouse y al teclado y rompi mi casa entera y le desenchufe el cable a mi abuelo para conectar mi pc asi que...Se ¿Porque no?
